name: Roberto
description: Roberto(b. 3001) is a recurring character inFuturama. He is a mentally unstablerobotwho enjoys stabbing people and objects, as well as robbing banks. He is regarded as being mentally unstable and has been seen in theHal Institute for Criminally Insane Robotsmultiple times, threatening both patients and doctors with knives, as well as escaping at least once. His insanity had been cured momentarily inBender's Game, but suffered a concussion and returned to his previous madness seconds later.

name: Clearcutter
description: TheClearcutteris a robot equipped with an ax and chainsaw. He was a member of theUltimate Robot Fighting League(URFL) and foughtBender. Bender won the fight, but it was a set up. It's also wondered if the Clearcutter can switch either his axe or chainsaw into a drill, because at one point in the fightLeelapoints out that he gets a drill through his head, although this is unknown. He is possibly a Canadian robot.

name: Fishy Joe
description: Joseph Gilman, often referred to asFishy Joe, is the owner of various restaurant chains, such asFishy Joe'sand Family Bros. Pizza. He is cruel, selfish, heartless, as well as only cares about getting money, which makes him a scrooge.

name: Ethan "Bubblegum" Tate
description: Ethan"Bubblegum"Tateis the leader of theHarlem Globetrotters. He once declared a war ofBasketballonEarthfor no practical reason. ProfessorHubert J. Farnsworthchallenged him with a team ofAtomic Supermen. However, since they turned out to be mere tots, he had his crew extractchronitonsfrom the Tempus Nebula to accelerate their growth. During the game atMadison Cube Garden, it seems that Farnsworth will win. Then suddenly, random time skips caught by the chroniton harvest have destabilized the ...

name: Robot Gypsy
description: Magda the Gypsybot, commonly known as theRobot Gypsy, is an automated noveltyrobotgypsy who offers her psychic services for money. Whether or not she has actual psychic powers is debatable. During the episode "The Honking", she was able to tell thatBenderwas aWere-Carjust by looking at him. However, in the episode "Godfellas", she faked her communications with Bender in order to, admittedly, give false hope toFry.

name: Sally
description: Sallyis an orphan at theCookieville Minimum-Security Orphanarium. She is one of the orphansBenderbriefly adopted. She is made fun of occasionally by other orphans because she has an ear on her face, and apparently, a tail. Sally states that she has done 100 "jumpropes" in a row. Even though she is mutated, she is sweet and nice to others.Sally is teased by the other kids from the Cookieville Minimum-Security Orphanarium with the limerick: "Ear Face! Ear Face! Sally won the Ugly Race!" Sally o...

name: Scruffy Scruffington
description: Scruffy Scruffington(born October 31, 2945) is thePlanet Expressjanitor. He originally started off as a minor character, who only made brief cameos in the background, until his speaking debut in "Anthology of Interest I". A recurring joke is that nobody remembers his name or ever seeing him before because of how little he's appeared. Scruffy has become a more prominent character as the series has progressed, but he still has a much smaller role compared to the show's main cast.

Frywho was sent there when theInstitute for Criminally Insane Humanswas filled up (after the judgeRon Whiteyhad it ruled out that being poor made someone insane).

name: Gumbotron
description: Gumbotron(b. 3001) is a (supposedly) one off character appearing in the episode "Rage Against the Vaccine". He appeared riding on a float in New New Orleans distributing Gumbo for the masses.

name: The New Justice Team
description: The New Justice Teamis a trio of superheroes who, in3004, briefly foughtNew New Yorkcrime, but disbanded after Becoming Wrong.

name: Unit 47
description: Eunice broke the Professor's heart by running off with another robot after 43 years with Farnsworth. The experience turned Farnsworth against robosexual relationships, fueling his opposition toProposition ∞.

name: Mr. Chunks
description: Mr. Chunks has lived a long, full life and now it's time for him to pass on. He was possibly a mascot ofPlanet Express, although this is never mentioned in "Attack of the Killer App". Mr. Chunks was familiar toAmyandBender, and very dear toFry, who cried after the goat's death. It's unknown if he was close to ProfessorFarnsworthand even if he knew about him. Also,Leeladidn't seem to care much.

name: Schlump
description: Schlump(June 2, 2977 - December 31, 3007) was one of theNudist Alien Scammers. He seems to be smarter than he appears and even manipulatesLeelainto giving him her email address. He is the shortest of the three brothers. He was killed with the destruction of the Scammer's ship.

name: Melllvar's mother
description: Melllvar's motheris the mother ofMelllvar. She takes him away for his dinner before he has finished playing with his "collectibles", the cast ofStar Trekand thePlanet Express crew. She is pink/purple instead of Melllvar's green color and has large cat's eyes glasses.

attributes.Appearance: " Where No Fan Has Gone Before "

name: John Quincy Adding Machine
description: TheJohn Quincy Adding Machinewas Earth's first robot president. He was elected by just one vote. It is said that the John Quincy Adding Machine struck a chord with the voters when he promised not to go on a killing spree, but, like all politicians he promised more than he could deliver. First mentioned in "A Head in the Polls".

name: Adlai Atkins
description: Adlai Atkins, also known asDr. Atkins, is a former orphan who grew up withTuranga LeelaatCookieville Minimum-Security Orphanarium. He became an eye phaser surgeon and started dating Leela after he performed a surgery to give her two eyes. He likes everything plain and normal. When Adlai and Leela decided to adopt a child, Leela picked a girl with an ear on her forehead. name: Kif Kroker

He also dislikes his boss' skimpy uniforms, the contents of which are frequently revealed to the unfortunate Kif when Brannigan climbs ladders on their spaceship, theNimbus. name: Robot General
description: TheRobot Generalwas the one to deliver the final blow to thehumanin the movie that had killedRusty. He tried to stop the human with magnetic fields, which failed. He shot a sharpened stick into its back and killed the human.
